business_strategies.strategy: Arbitrage mechanism for price stability in stable coins
business_strategies.implementation: Create swap mechanism where 1 UST can be swapped for $1 worth of Luna
business_strategies.expected_results: Maintains price stability around $1 through market forces

business_strategies.strategy: High yield offerings to attract capital
business_strategies.implementation: Offer 20+ percent yields through protocols like Anchor
business_strategies.expected_results: Attracts users to lock up capital in the ecosystem

steps: create blog content about this phenomenon

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Investing in potential Ponzi schemes without understanding yield sources
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Complete loss of investment (speaker lost $10,000 in BitConnect)
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Research where yields actually come from, be skeptical of unsustainably high returns
mistakes_to_avoid.example: BitConnect rug pull from 2017, current concerns about Terra/Luna ecosystem
